page.title: 08A Day in the Life of Carla 2
page.content: At 1.00 we go back into school. On Monday afternoon we have apparatus, so all the people in my class get changed into their P.E kit (shorts and a t-shirt). When we get back from P.E it's about 2.00, so there isn't much time until school ends at 3.00. We finish off little bits of work until 2.30. At 2.30 we sometimes have a story. The one we are reading at the moment is called "The Hobbit". At 3.00 it is time to go home. We go into the hall and when we are all ready we lead out to the coaches. I usually get home at about 3.20. I change my clothes and go and play with my friends. At 6.00 my dad comes home from work and we all sit down for tea. After tea I sometimes go outside and play but I usually stay indoors and watch T.V. At 9.00 I go to bed, and that is what Monday is like for me.
